roleset.name: put under the control of the federal government

role.descr: causer of change to government control

example.name: example with arg 0
example.text: My ammendment does not federalize the Border Patrol.

roleset.name: unite together for a common purpose

example.name: example with arg 1
example.text: [The country]-1 was federalized [*-1] after the civil war.
